HomePage.heroLine:
Smart Solutions
with AI & Cloud Data
HomePage.ipadAlt: Example dashboard displayed on a tablet
HomePage.howItWorksDesc: Our system uses remote data to generate useful insights, helping organizations improve efficiency and make informed decisions. Seamlessly integrating with equipment and management tools, it delivers practical solutions tailored to each project’s unique needs.
HomePage.etMappingDesc: Our data maps are derived from daily measurements with high resolution, offering insights tailored to the current operational requirements. This information also supports precise and efficient resource management for any system in use.
HomePage.localizedMappingDesc: The maps are designed specifically for the devices they will be used on. By factoring in device configuration, we offer targeted data layers ensuring adjustments reach exactly where they are required.
HomePage.hoseReelAlt: Image of a mobile reel device

APIsPage.howToIntegrateDesc: With our simple APIs, the generated maps can integrate with controllers, fully automating the data-driven process. Devices are automatically adjusted based on the provided recommendations, delivering exactly the right action where it is required.
APIsPage.raindancerDesc: Our service is now available within the partner platform. By integrating advanced mapping into the platform, we provide users with an easy, effective way to harness the power of external data for optimized operations.
APIsPage.raindancerScreenshotAlt: Platform screenshot showing a sample map

definitions.p1: "We", "our", and "the Service" refer to Example Company. "Services" include our site, APIs, data sets, and related software.

services.p1: We provide online tools and related APIs. We may update or discontinue features at any time.
services.l1: Service availability may vary by location and integrations.
services.l2: Trials are time-limited and may be withdrawn for misuse.
services.l3: Beta features are provided without guarantees.

accounts.p1: You are responsible for protecting your credentials and ensuring your activity follows these terms.

apiUse.l1: Do not share keys or exceed allowed request limits.
apiUse.l2: Store and use data only as permitted by documentation.
apiUse.l3: Do not reverse engineer or scrape beyond approved endpoints.

payments.p1: Paid plans and usage charges are outlined in your account or order details. All fees are non-refundable unless required by law.

ip.p1: We retain all rights to the Services and content. You own your content. Using our APIs does not grant ownership of our IP.

acceptableUse.l2: No disruption or overload of the Services.
acceptableUse.l3: Respect privacy and intellectual property rights.

privacy.p1: We process personal data according to our Privacy Policy and applicable laws.

disclaimers.p1: The Services are provided "as is" without warranties, to the extent permitted by law.

liability.p1: To the extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

law.p1: These terms are governed by the laws of the relevant jurisdiction.

contact.p1: Questions about these terms? Contact us at
